author: jeffreyr
msg: Added patch send by Neil de Hoog on 10/09/2000 - I reviewed this fix

author: andyc
msg: 1) Fixed some bugs with the entity manager. It was pushing internal
entities onto the entity stack correctly but would barf on the
first entity being popped off of the stack.
2) Added ability to support external entities, as well.
3) Modified entity manager to use XMLInputSource so that I can
carry additional information with the input source such as
the base system identifier and expanded system identifier.
4) Updated classes that call into the entity manager to use the
5) Set the constants for the error reporter severity levels.
TODO: External entities need to be tested more.
